column1: in memory of james ""bo"" leroy cranmer| first: last: send card. james ""bo"" leroy cranmer. september 20
column3: 2015 james bo leroy cranmer jr. james bo cranmer jr.
column14: missouri. bo was born the son of james leroy and jacqueline louise (ross) cranmer
column18: missouri. he was a 1979 graduate of meadville high school
column20: missouri. he was united in marriage to brenda bearpaw on june 5
column23: missouri. to this union two sons were born. bo worked as a corrections officer at the chillicothe correctional center. he also worked at the constitution tribune
column26: and as an activities director at the daviess county nursing home
column28: missouri. bo was an artist; he loved to draw and enjoyed playing music. survivors include two sons
column29: brandon cranmer and wife kandis of blue springs
column31: and james leroy (bo) cranmer iii of grain valley
column34: missouri; two sisters cathi cranmer of chillicothe
column42: and gavin cranmer; and numerous nieces and nephews. he was preceded in death by his parents; grandparents; and great-grandparents. funeral services will be held at the lindley funeral home
column48: at 1:30 p. m. a scheduled family visitation will be held at the lindley funeral home
column54: from 6:00 p. m. until 8:00 p. m. friends may call at the lindley funeral home
column60: from 12 noon until 8:00 p. m. burial will be held at laclede cemetery
column62: missouri. memorial contributions may be made to daviess county nursing home activities department and may be left at or mailed to lindley funeral home
column65: missouri 64601. online condolences may be left at www. lindleyfuneralhomes. com. arrangements are under the direction of lindley funeral home
